concept-wr.title: Data Network Planning
concept-wr.shortdesc: The data network is the backing network for the overlay tenant networks and therefore has a direct impact on the networking performance of the guest.

conbody.p: There are several factors that contribute to the overall network performance.
Titanium Server supports the use of consolidated interfaces for the management, infrastructure, OAM, and data networks. For best performance, Wind River recommends that you use dedicated interfaces.
For detailed information about network performance (including vSwitch, SRIOV, and PCI-PT dimensioning), see Titanium Server System Engineering Guidelines: .
For other factors that may impact the overall guest network performance, see Titanium Server System Engineering Guidelines: .
